text: To make a pottery kiln dig a hole in the ground.
Shift-right-click with an ingredient to place a kiln.
And Logs. It needs 6 logs to be placed.
Then light it on fire. You don't need to cover this one. It needs to burn. Watch out for rain.
After its done it will too turn to ash.
Dig it out with a shovel.
The results. You will get ash in exchange for the fuel.
